title: 服务器莫名关闭 怀疑主线程问题
author: 颜民2333
txt_content:
本帖最后由 颜民2333 于 2019-12-26 21:10 编辑 

服务器经常自动关闭 并重启
一下是logs文件
服务器版本1.12.2 核心catserver







2019-12-26-20.zip


2019-12-26 20:17 上传
点击文件名下载附件




49.6 KB, 下载次数: 7

replies.author: ddoc
replies.txt_content:
看了下崩溃，问题挺多的，先更新catserver试试：https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-924736-1-1.html


ic2这个mod问题，Ender IO 这个mod问题，Dakimakura这个mod问题，Armourer's Workshop这个mod问题
我怀疑catserver端太老问题








根目录找到server.properties配置文件
找到max-tick-time选项改成0




config文件夹下打开forge.cfg文件
找到这些选项
    # Enable uploading cloud geometry to the GPU for faster rendering.
    B:forgeCloudsEnabled=false
false改成true

    # Enable forge to queue all chunk updates to the Chunk Update thread. May increase FPS significantly, but may also cause weird rendering lag. Not recommended for computers without a significant number of cores available.
    B:alwaysSetupTerrainOffThread=false

false改成true

    # Set to true to disable Forge's version check mechanics. Forge queries a small json file on our server for version information. For more details see the ForgeVersion class in our github.
    B:disableVersionCheck=false
false改成true


    # Enable the entire mod update check system. This only applies to mods using the Forge system.
    B:Global=false

false改成true


    # Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

    # Set this to true to remove any TileEntity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringTileEntities=false


两个false都改成true

昨天我开服测试到现在 特意禁止了玩家进入服务器
服务器依旧还是卡住
这次卡住后台指令没有任何反应
关掉后也没有logs文件

replies.author: yuejiewudi1997
replies.txt_content:
首先，大部分都是mod报错，尝试升级更高版本的serverAPI
其次大量的主数据报错，很可能是服务端的主数据文件损坏，或者mod覆盖导致的临时性损坏。
建议测试的时候一个一个添加mod进行排错，现在错误过多，已经分不清是什么优先导致的崩溃。
最后，本人不建议使用catsever，1.12.2使用mohist较为稳定。
